casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Timothy Earl BLACKWELL. No. 490PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 2, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Amy C. Kunstling, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Blackwell.

ORDER

Defendant's Motion to File Supplemental Response on the Question of Special Verdicts is allowed. The Attorney General shall have seven days from the date of this Order to file a response.

By order of the Court in Conference, this the 2nd day of November, 2006.
